arabicText: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ تَبَّتۡ یَدَاۤ أَبِی لَهَبࣲ وَتَبَّ

translations.en: DOOMED are the hands of him of the glowing countence: and doomed is he!
translations.ar: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ تَبَّتۡ یَدَاۤ أَبِی لَهَبࣲ وَتَبَّ

arabicText: مَاۤ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

translations.en: What will his wealth avail him, and all that he has gained?
translations.ar: مَاۤ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

translations.en: [In the life to come] he shall have to endure a fire fiercely glowing;
together with his wife, that carrier of evil tales,
[who bears] around her neck a rope of twisted strands!
